full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
Chancery Cleaning Services for the Embassy of Canada to Denmark in Copenhagen

## Reference Number
CB-559-50832952

## Request for Proposal Details
The Embassy of Canada to Denmark in Copenhagen is inviting proposals for Chancery Cleaning Services.

### Description
The Embassy has a property in an office building with a gross area of approximately 1,132 m². The offices require regular cleaning to maintain a comfortable working environment for employees and visitors. The facilities include an elevator area, lobby, airlock, consular booth, conference room, and additional amenities.

### Scope of Work
The proposer will be responsible for providing all necessary personnel, equipment, and materials to perform the cleaning services according to the Embassy's requirements.

### Proposal Submission Information
Proposals should be submitted via email to internationalproposals@international.gc.ca by 14:00:00 (Copenhagen) on May 21, 2024.

### Contracting Entity Information
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada is the contracting entity for this tender.

### Procurement Details
- **Procurement Category**: SRV
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

Please access the detailed tender notice and instructions via the attached document:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36227/24-255815---copen---rfp---chancery-cleaning-services-for-the-embassy-of-canada-to-denmark%2C-in-copenhague.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36227/24-255815---copen---ddp---services-de-nettoyage-de-la-chancellerie-pour-lambassade-du-canada-au-danemark%2C-a-copenhague.pdf>

For inquiry, contact us at: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca or (343) 203-0000.
